metadata.title: CVE-2020-26572 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The TCOS smart card software driver in OpenSC before 0.21.0-rc1 has astack-based buffer overflow in tcos_decipher.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.15.0-1ubuntu1+esm1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.15.0-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: opensc package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.15.0-1ubuntu1+esm1').
